BBEX3.A.UAH.USD.CA.AC.A04: Exchange rates for the US dollar in the  Ukraine / USD 100 = UAH ... (middle)

General: With effect from 2 September 1996, a currency conversion took place at the rate of 100,000 karbowanez (URK) = 1 hryvnia (UAH). The currency conversion did not entail any appreciation or depreciation against other currencies.
Source: National Bank of Ukraine, Kyiv
Methodology: 1996 and 1997, calculated on the basis of month-end rates, on the basis of mid-month and month-end rates thereafter.

Comment on 1996: With effect from 2 September 1996, a currency conversion took place at the rate of 100,000 karbowanez (URK) = 1 hryvnia (UAH), the exchange rates for the krabowanez calculated until August were included in the annual averages calculation at this rate.
